title: STP 15: Community Meeting
body:
Due the lack of transparency and no contact with the devs in the lasts three months, we as community would like to propose the an obligatorie communication from the BTCST Team to the community at least once a month trought Telegram Group and BTSCT Medium. The communication must be made by devs or a comunity manager to be hired and paid with BTC mining rewards. This contact with the community will bring lights in the lasts unsuccessful events (t assets peg, ltc and others) and discuss better strategies for the future. We belive with more transparency and communication BTCST can become one of the greastest projects in BSC.

If this STP pass, the first Community Meeting should be held until 26/08 and the followings meetings every last thursday of each month.

Options
• Pass
• Deny

Voting time: 04/08/2021 10:00pm to 11/08/2021 11:00pm SGT
author: 0x17004fD501b289BFB4D4a81E6d79cDcAF211882A
